name: RooTs (SK7LL)
description:
Fullscreen the game for better experience :)

===================================================

Controls:

[ W ] ,[  A  ], [ S ] and [ D ] for Movement

[ J ] is for loosening the soil

[ K ]  is for putting water on the soil

[ B ] is for placing wood

[ V ] is for breaking the wood

========================================================

Your Sam, Sam always wanted to be a farmer. He likes corn because it's sweet.

He lived in countryside far away from the city. Sam decided to run a corn business,

but one day a virus rapidly spread in the city, A zombie apocalypse they say in the TV.

The zombie eats' everything that has life, even plants, fruit and vegetables.  

Sam heard it from the news and he was too scared because maybe he can't plant corns in he's farm. The zombie have been in his land because of the virus.

The question is:

Can you defend your farm and plant more corns?

or give it to the zombies?

Make your decision.
